alert.note: Alert for Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 2:16PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Chicot, northern Washington and southwestern Bolivar Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 216 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Arkansas City, or 13 miles southeast of Rohwer, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Scott, Benoit and Lamont around 225 PM CDT. Winterville around 230 PM CDT. Greenville and Metcalfe around 235 PM CDT. Leland around 250 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
